description.german: Erlange alle Errungenschaften.
description.french: Obtenez tous les succès.
description.spanish: Obtén todos los logros.
description.tchinese: 可解除所有實績。
description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as conquistas.

displayName.spanish: Weiss, el Señor de los Kobolds
displayName.tchinese: 擊倒《邪惡・狗頭人領主》

description.german: Schließe die Weiten Ebenen von Rustoria ab.
description.french: Terminez les plaines de Rustoria.
description.spanish: Completa las Llanuras de Rustoria.
description.tchinese: 完全攻略《留斯托利亞大草原》
description.brazilian: Conclua as Planícies de Rustoria.

description.german: Schließe den Großen Altrobenwald ab.
description.french: Terminez la forêt de Robevieille.
description.spanish: Completa el Bosque Oldrobe.
description.tchinese: 完全攻略《奧爾多羅布大森林》
description.brazilian: Conclua a Floresta de Oldrobe.

displayName.tchinese: 擊倒《召喚・宿命統治者》

description.german: Schließe die Juwelengipfel-Seen ab.
description.french: Terminez les lacs des Pics sertis.
description.spanish: Completa los lagos de los Picos Enjoyados.
description.tchinese: 完全攻略《裘埃爾皮克湖沼群》
description.brazilian: Conclua os Lagos do Pico das Joias.

description.german: Schließe die Kurjiez-Wüste ab.
description.french: Terminez le désert de Kurjiez.
description.spanish: Completa el Desierto Kurjiez.
description.tchinese: 完全攻略《克爾多西幾沙漠》
description.brazilian: Conclua o Deserto de Kurjiez.

displayName.tchinese: 你配不上黑色劍士這個稱號

description.english: Defeat Genesis in the Temple of Prayers.
description.german: Besiege Genesis im Tempel der Gebete.
description.french: Battez Genesis au Temple des prières.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Genesis nel Tempio delle preghiere.
description.spanish: Derrota a Genesis en el Templo de los Ruegos.
description.tchinese: 在祈禱神殿打倒傑涅西斯
description.brazilian: Derrote Genesis no Templo das Orações.

description.german: Besiege Tia in Aincrad.
description.french: Battez Tia à Aincrad.
description.spanish: Derrota a Tia en Aincrad.
description.tchinese: 在艾恩葛朗特打倒緹兒
description.brazilian: Derrote Tia em Aincrad.

description.english: Complete Asuna, Yuuki, and Strea's quests.
description.german: Schließe Asunas, Yuukis und Streas Quests ab.
description.french: Terminez les quêtes d'Asuna, de Yuuki et de Strea.
description.italian: Completa le missioni di Asuna, Yuuki, e Strea.
description.spanish: Completa las misiones de Asuna, Yuuki y Strea.
description.tchinese: 完成亞絲娜與有紀跟斯朵蕾雅的章節
description.brazilian: Conclua as missões de Asuna, Yuuki e Strea.

displayName.tchinese: 還請多多惠顧兩人的店

description.german: Schließe Liz' und Silicas Quests ab.
description.french: Terminez les quêtes de Liz et de Silica.
description.italian: Completa le missioni di Liz e Silica.
description.spanish: Completa las misiones de Liz y Silica.
description.tchinese: 完成莉茲與西莉卡的章節
description.brazilian: Conclua as missões de Liz e Silica.

description.german: Schließe Leafas und Philias Quests ab.
description.french: Terminez les quêtes de Leafa et de Philia.
description.italian: Completa le missioni di Leafa e Philia.
description.spanish: Completa las misiones de Leafa y Philia.
description.tchinese: 完成莉法與菲莉亞的章節
description.brazilian: Conclua as missões de Leafa e Philia.

description.german: Schließe Yuis und Argos Quests ab.
description.french: Terminez les quêtes de Yui et d'Argo.
description.italian: Completa le missioni di Yui e Argo.
description.spanish: Completa las misiones de Yui y Argo.
description.tchinese: 完成結衣與阿爾戈的章節
description.brazilian: Conclua as missões de Yui e Argo.

description.german: Schließe Sinons Quests ab.
description.french: Terminez les quêtes de Sinon.
description.spanish: Completa las misiones de Sinon.
description.tchinese: 完成詩音的章節
description.brazilian: Conclua as missões de Sinon.

description.german: Schließe die "Schwert des Imperators"-Quests ab.
description.french: Terminez les quêtes de l'Épée de l'empereur.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni della Spada dell’Imperatore.
description.spanish: Completa las misiones de la Espada del Emperador.
description.tchinese: 完成帝王之劍的章節
description.brazilian: Conclua as missões da Espada do Imperador.

description.german: Schließe Kizmels Quests ab.
description.french: Terminez les quêtes de Kizmel.
description.spanish: Completa las misiones de Kizmel.
description.tchinese: 完成基滋梅爾的章節
description.brazilian: Conclua as missões de Kizmel.

displayName.spanish: El trabajo duro da sus frutos

description.english: Have over 10,000 levels divided among all skills.
description.german: Erreiche 10.000 Level über alle Skills verteilt.
description.french: Atteignez 10 000 niveaux répartis entre toutes vos compétences.
description.italian: Ottieni più di 10.000 livelli divisi tra tutte le abilità.
description.spanish: Consigue más de 10 000 niveles divididos entre todas las habilidades.
description.tchinese: 技能熟練度總計超過１００００
description.brazilian: Tenha mais de 10.000 níveis divididos entre todas as técnicas.

description.german: Erlerne 200 Skills.
description.french: Apprenez 200 compétences.
description.spanish: Aprende 200 habilidades.
description.tchinese: 取得２００種技能
description.brazilian: Aprenda 200 técnicas.

description.german: Erreiche Level 50 mit Kirito.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 50 avec Kirito.
description.spanish: Llega al nivel 50 con Kirito.
description.tchinese: 桐人等級超過５０
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 50 com Kirito.

description.english: Max out a sword skill mastery.
description.german: Maximiere die Beherrschung eines Schwertskills.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau de maîtrise maximum pour une compétence d'épée.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello massimo di maestria in una abilità di spada.
description.spanish: Sube al máximo una maestría de habilidad de espada.
description.tchinese: 劍技熟練度達到最高等級
description.brazilian: Chegue ao nível máximo num domínio de técnica de espada.

description.english: Get a 10-hit chain with Sword Skill Connect.
description.german: Schaffe eine 10-Treffer-Kette mit Schwertskill-Verbindung.
description.french: Réalisez un enchaînement de 10 coups avec un Skill Connect d'épée.
description.italian: Ottieni una serie da 10 colpi con una catena di abilità di spada.
description.koreana: 소드 스킬 커넥트를 10 연계 이상 성공시킨다
description.spanish: Encadena 10 golpes con Conexión de habilidades de espada.
description.tchinese: 劍技連接成功達１０連擊以上
description.brazilian: Obtenha uma comb. de 10 acertos conectando T. de Espada.

description.german: Erlerne den Extraskill "Himmelsklingen".
description.french: Apprenez la compétence bonus "Lames célestes".
description.spanish: Aprende la habilidad extra "Espadas celestiales".
description.tchinese: 解放特別技能《絕界雙星劍》
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica extra "Lâminas Celestiais".

displayName.tchinese: 特別技能《無限幻影荊棘》

description.english: Learn the extra skill "Thorn of Illusions."
description.german: Erlerne den Extraskill "Illusionendorn".
description.french: Apprenez la compétence bonus "Illusépine".
description.spanish: Aprende la habilidad extra "Espina de las ilusiones".
description.tchinese: 解放特別技能《無限幻影荊棘》
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica extra "Espinho das Ilusões".

description.german: Erlerne den Extraskill "Fliegendes Schlitzen".
description.french: Apprenez la compétence bonus "Taillade".
description.spanish: Aprende la habilidad extra "Tajo volador".
description.tchinese: 解放特別技能《飛閃一刀》
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica extra "Corte Crescente".

description.french: Apprenez la compétence bonus "Lame de damnés".
description.spanish: Aprende la habilidad extra "Espada de los malditos".
description.tchinese: 解放特別技能《冥界劍》
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica extra "Lâmina dos Condenados".

description.german: Erlerne den Extraskill "Geheiligtes Kreuz".
description.french: Apprenez la compétence bonus "Croix bénie".
description.spanish: Aprende la habilidad extra "Cruz honesta".
description.tchinese: 解放特別技能《聖印十字劍》
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica extra "Cruz da Justiça".

description.german: Erlerne den Extraskill "Bezahnter Wächter".
description.french: Apprenez la compétence bonus "Gardien vorace".
description.spanish: Aprende la habilidad extra "Guardián con colmillos".
description.tchinese: 解放特別技能《封牙守護士》
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica extra "Guardião de Presas".

description.german: Erlerne den Extraskill "Kriegstreiber".
description.french: Apprenez la compétence bonus "Belliciste".
description.spanish: Aprende la habilidad extra "Belicista".
description.tchinese: 解放特別技能《迴響鬥爭者》
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica extra "Amante da Guerra".

description.german: Erlerne den Extraskill "Assassinenklinge".
description.french: Apprenez la compétence bonus "Lame assassine".
description.spanish: Aprende la habilidad extra "Espada del asesino".
description.tchinese: 解放特別技能《深界暗殺劍》
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica extra "Lâmina do Assassino".

description.german: Erlerne den Extraskill "Verjüngende Berührung".
description.french: Apprenez la compétence bonus "Régénération".
description.spanish: Aprende la habilidad extra "Toque rejuvenecedor".
description.tchinese: 解放特別技能《玲瓏療癒手》
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica extra "Toque Rejuvenescedor".

description.english: Max affinity with all main characters.
description.german: Maximale Zuneigung mit allen Hauptcharakteren.
description.french: Améliorez au maximum votre affinité avec tous les personnages principaux.
description.italian: Affinità massima con tutti i personaggi principali.
description.spanish: Consigue la máxima afinidad con todos los personajes principales.
description.tchinese: 可將主要成員的好感度提升至Max。
description.brazilian: Afinidade máxima com todos os personagens principais.

description.german: Schließe die Galerie ab.
description.french: Complétez la galerie.
description.spanish: Completa la galería.
description.tchinese: 完整收藏美術館所有資料
description.brazilian: Conclua a galeria.

description.german: Hab 100 Freunde mit Freundschaft-Level Freundschaftlich oder mehr.
description.french: Ayez 100 amis avec une Amitié minimum de rang Amis.
description.italian: Raggiungi 100 amici con un'Amicizia di rango almeno “Amichevole”.
description.koreana: Friendship이 랭크 3(친한 사이) 이상의 친구를 100명 이상 만든다
description.spanish: Haz 100 amigos con al menos rango de Amistad "Amigo".
description.tchinese: Friendship（友好階級）為３（好朋友）以上的夥伴達到１００人以上
description.brazilian: Tenha 100 amigos com nível de amizade "Amigável".

description.english: Reach maximum enhancement with a weapon.
description.german: Verbessere eine Waffe auf das Maximum.
description.french: Améliorez une arme au maximum.
description.italian: Raggiungi il potenziamento massimo con un’arma.
description.spanish: Alcanza la mejora máxima con un arma.
description.tchinese: 將武器強化到最大值
description.brazilian: Alcance a melhoria máxima com uma arma.

description.german: Finde einen legendären Gegenstand.
description.french: Trouvez un objet légendaire.
description.spanish: Encuentra un objeto legendario.
description.tchinese: 取得傳說等級的武器
description.brazilian: Encontre um item lendário.

description.english: Get the last attack bonus on all Ainground bosses.
description.german: Erhalte den Bonus für den Letzten Angriff bei allen Ainground-Bossen.
description.french: Obtenez le bonus de coup de grâce sur tous les boss d'Ainground.
description.italian: Ottieni il bonus ultimo attacco su tutti i boss di Ainground.
description.koreana: 아인 그라운드의 모든 보스에게서 라스트 어택 보너스를 입수한다
description.spanish: Consigue la bonificación de último ataque con todos los jefes de Ainground.
description.tchinese: 與艾恩葛勞德中所有頭目戰鬥時，皆可獲得最後一擊獎勵。
description.brazilian: Ganhe o bônus de último ataque contra todos os chefes de Ainground.

description.german: Besitze über 1.000.000 Col.
description.french: Possédez 1 000 000 de Cols.
description.spanish: Ten más de 1 000 000 Col.
description.tchinese: 存下１００萬珂爾
description.brazilian: Obtenha mais de 1.000.000 de Col.

displayName.tchinese: 夥伴就算不在身邊也會一起努力！

description.german: Besiege 100 Monster mit Namen im Multiplayer.
description.french: Battez 100 monstres uniques en mode multijoueur.
description.spanish: Derrota a 100 monstruos infames en multijugador.
description.tchinese: 在多人遊玩擊倒１００個NM級的敵人
description.brazilian: Derrote 100 Monstros Raros no modo multiplayer.

description.english: Defeat the Prayer Conduit with over 100 hours of gameplay logged.
description.german: Besiege den Gebetsleiter mit über 100 Stunden Spielzeit.
description.french: Battez le Canaliseur de prière en ayant cumulé plus de 100 heures de jeu.
description.italian: Completa il Condotto della preghiera dopo oltre 100 ore di gioco.
description.koreana: 플레이 시간이 100시간을 넘은 상태에서 《프레이 더 오리진 미디엄》을 쓰러뜨렸다
description.spanish: Derrota el conducto de oración con más de 100 horas de conexión al juego.
description.tchinese: 遊玩時間超過100小時候，打倒《祈禱起源媒介》。
description.brazilian: Derrote o Condutor de Orações com mais de 100 horas de jogo registradas.

description.english: Get wiped out and respawn at the Teleport Gate Plaza.
description.german: Stirb und respawne am Plaza mit Teleporttor.
description.french: Faites-vous tuer pour revenir sur la place du téléporteur.
description.italian: Vieni sconfitto e ricompari alla Piazza del teletrasporto.
description.spanish: Muere y reaparece en la plaza del portal de teletransporte.
description.tchinese: 全軍覆沒後在轉移門廣場復活
description.brazilian: Morra e ressurja na Praça do Portal de Teleporte.

description.english: Help a party member in need.
description.german: Hilf einem Gruppenmitglied in Not.
description.french: Aidez un membre du groupe dans le besoin.
description.italian: Aiuta un membro del gruppo in difficoltà.
description.spanish: Ayuda a un miembro de tu equipo en apuros.
description.tchinese: 幫助力竭身亡的夥伴
description.brazilian: Ajude um membro da equipe necessitado.
